sentences.en: Elsewhere, the rearrangement of the book trade continues apace.
sentences.cn: 在其他地方, 图书业也在继续调整和改变.

sentences.en: Expansion of the company has continued apace .
I sat down and saw the box and dice go round apace.
sentences.cn: 我坐下看骰子在盘子里迅速地转动着.

sentences.en: In the next two years his affairs crumbled apace.
sentences.cn: 在以后的两年中他的事业急速地崩溃了.

sentences.en: Peter , take my fan, and go before and apace.
sentences.cn: 给我带路, 拿着我的扇子, 快些走.

sentences.en: Potential demand can is apace mirrored whole supply a system inside?
sentences.cn: 潜在的需求能不能快速地反映到整个供应体系里面?

sentences.en: The business has been growing apace for the last year.
sentences.cn: 商业在过去的一年里发展迅速.

sentences.en: The development of complex function theory proceeded apace in the latter part of the nineteenth century.
sentences.cn: 十九世纪后期,复函数的理论迅速地发展.

sentences.en: The hours and days speed apace.
The news of victory spread apace.
The trot is apace of the horse.
When he was permitted to play outside, the boy cocked apace.
sentences.cn: 那男孩征得同意到外边去玩之后, 飞快地跑走了.
